items.title: Rising Demand for Synchronous Condensers Enhances Grid Stability Amid Renewable Integration
items.tldr: The deployment of synchronous condensers is increasing to address grid stability challenges posed by higher renewable energy penetration.

items.title: GIS Transformer Market Sees Growth Amid Urban Substation Space Constraints
items.tldr: Gas-insulated switchgear (GIS) transformers are gaining market traction due to their compact design suited for urban substations with limited space.

items.title: HVDC Interconnection Projects Accelerate to Support Cross-Border Renewable Energy Trade
items.tldr: High Voltage Direct Current (HVDC) interconnections are expanding globally to enable efficient cross-border transmission of renewable energy.
